metadata.dc:author: Porras Gallo, I
metadata.dc:description: This article studies the establishment of the Alfonso XIII Institute of Serotherapy, Inoculation and Bacteriology in 1899, using the general press and the professional-scientific, medical and pharmaceutical press as its prime source, It aims to highlight the principal factors which led to its gestation and later development, as well as the circumstances which led to its creation, by analyzing the antecedents and orgins of the aforementioned institution.
metadata.dc:title: Antecedentes y creación del Instituto de Sueroterapia, Vacunación y Bacteriología de Alfonso XIII.
[The antecedents and creation of the Alfonso XIII Institute of Serotherapy, Inoculation and Bacteriology].
